verses.name: Genesis 46:13
verses.text: And the sons of Issachar; Tola, and Phuvah, and Job, and Shimron.

verses.name: Genesis 46:14
verses.text: And the sons of Zebulun; Sered, and Elon, and Jahleel.

verses.name: Genesis 46:15
verses.text: These be the sons of Leah, which she bare unto Jacob in Padan–aram, with his daughter Dinah: all the souls of his sons and his daughters were thirty and three.

verses.name: Genesis 46:16
verses.text: And the sons of Gad; Ziphion, and Haggi, Shuni, and Ezbon, Eri, and Arodi, and Areli.

verses.name: Genesis 46:17
verses.text: And the sons of Asher; Jimnah, and Ishuah, and Isui, and Beriah, and Serah their sister: and the sons of Beriah; Heber, and Malchiel.
